https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6uvsPkJYDYSqOkQXIH8YnW4Wb6l.jpg Leigh runs the website "Bad Date Chronicles," which allows people to anonymously post horrible date experiences. When rival blogger Conner becomes the subject of one of her posts, they agree to date each other to see which one is the "bad dater." Bad Date Chronicles
